### Storage

```{r topology-storage-table, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(storage_resources, removeCols = c("storageCapacity", "storageAllocatable"))
```

#### Storage capacity 

```{r topology-resources-storage-capacity-table, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(cbind(nodeName = storage_resources$nodeName, storage_resources$storageCapacity))
```

#### Storage allocatable

```{r topology-resources-storage-allocatable-table, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(cbind(nodeName = storage_resources$nodeName, storage_resources$storageAllocatable))
```
